public interface IOntologyMapping

Ontology mapping interface.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Tomasz Adamusiak, Morris Swertz

Method Summary
 java.util.regex.Pattern getConfirmMatchPattern()
          A regular expression pattern which confirms that a particular concept string represents OntologyTerm encapsulated by this mapping.
 java.util.regex.Pattern getExtractIDPattern()
          A regular expression pattern which can convert a concept string confirmed with MatchPattern to a format acceptable by the OntologyService.
 java.lang.String getOntologyAccession()
          Stores the ontology accession corresponding to the mapping.
 java.lang.String getTestCode()
          Testing ontology term code used to confirm that the service can resolve the mappings correctly.
